arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich Champions League preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Team news, predicted lineups and key insights ahead of Paris Saint-Germain vs. Bayern Munich in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Dembélé in the squad, but not in the starting lineup?
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé (28), the Paris Saint-Germain winger, is expected to be in the squad for Tuesday’s Champions League clash against Bayern Munich, according to RMC Sport and L’Équipe. However, the French international, who was recently rested, is not expected to start. Luis Enrique is not taking any risks at this stage of the season. “Dembélé […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Paris training live this Monday
arts.sum: This Monday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will be training at the PSG Campus at 11 a.m. CET to prepare for Tuesday evening’s match against Bayern Munich (2nd) at the Parc des Princes during the 4th day of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). A session that the club is offering to follow live: […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Paris’ training session this Sunday in video
arts.sum: This Tuesday evening, Paris Saint-Germain hosts Bayern Munich at the Parc des Princes (kick-off at 9 pm, CET) for Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. To build anticipation for this match, PSG shared video clips from their training session this Sunday. These include footage of Ousmane Dembélé (the 28-year-old forward), whose participation has been […]

arts.ttl: Why Bayern Munich will beat Paris Saint-Germain in the UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Bayern defeated PSG in the final to win the 2019/20 Champions League. They kicked off with a 3-1 win over FIFA Club World Cup champions Chelsea – who breezed past PSG 3-0 in the final of that tournament – before putting Pafos and Club Brugge to the sword with 5-1 and 4-0 victories respectively.

arts.ttl: PSG’s schedule this week: Bayern Munich and Lyon before the break
arts.sum: On Monday, Paris Saint-Germain released its schedule for the week. It’s a busy one, as the Parisians have two matches: hosting Bayern Munich on Tuesday (Champions League Matchday 4) and traveling to Lyon on Sunday for Matchday 12 of Ligue 1. Before each match, there will be a press conference with coach Luis Enrique. These […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Dembélé news after the scare
arts.sum: This Tuesday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Bayern Munich (2nd) at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 pm, CET). This Sunday, Le Parisien and L’Equipe reported that Ousmane Dembélé (28-year-old forward) was able to participate in training. Le Parisien : “PSG: reassuring news for Ousmane Dembélé, […]

arts.ttl: Jackson decision for Kompany: How Bayern could line up against PSG on Tuesday
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Bayern Munich could line up for Tuesday's Champions League clash against Paris Saint-Germain.
